org.teatrove.trove.util
Class DecimalFormat

java.lang.Object
  org.teatrove.trove.util.DecimalFormat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class DecimalFormat
extends Object
implements Cloneable

Similar to DecimalFormat, except rounding is more intuitive. Only formatting is supported, but all patterns are compatible with DecimalFormat.

Version:
Author:
Brian S O'Neill
